translations: v．激昂地演讲，朗诵：以激昂、有力的语气公开发表意见或朗诵文学作品。
· He declaimed against the injustice of the government.
他激昂地谴责政府的不公正。

sentences.sentence: He declaimed against the evils of alcohol.
sentences.translation: 他慷慨陈词，猛烈抨击酗酒的罪恶。

sentences.sentence: She declaimed the famous opening speech of the play.
sentences.translation: 她慷慨激昂地朗诵了这出戏中著名的开场白。

sentences.sentence: He raised his right fist and declaimed: "Liar and cheat!"
sentences.translation: 他举起右拳慷慨陈词:"骗子！"
